title: Netflix Expanding into Video Games? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.21.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Netflix's possible expansion into gaming, Overwatch changing to 5v5, and more!

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:24 - Housekeeping
Remember today: We’re streaming for the Palestine Children’s Relief Fund at 11 a.m. PT. twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. You can start donating -- and learning about the charity -- now at kindafunny.com/palestine!
The Roper Report -
00:05:20 - Netflix really wants to get into video games
00:15:15 - Overwatch 2 is changing to a 5v5 game
00:30:18 - Ads
00:32:57 - Mass Effect's Normandy Is Now in No Man's Sky
00:40:36 - Devolver Digital’s Phantom Abyss looks like Fall Guys meets Indiana Jones
00:43:29 - Hot Wheels Unleashed revealed their new College Campus environment
00:46:38 - Out today
00:48:20 - “Will this online E3 be a one-off thing or an evolution of the event?” - Jordan Lee Rowan
00:54:23 - Required Reading - https://bit.ly/3ywy9Ni 
00:56:16 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Blessing and Tim
Tuesday - Greg and Whitta
Wednesday - Blessing and Andy
Thursday - Blessing and Tim
Friday - Greg and Blessing
